message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with color constancy and illumination estimation, which are core topics in computer vision (cs.CV). The use of Fourier transform for color constancy is a well-established technique (cs.MM), and the paper also introduces a statistical grayness index for illumination estimation (cs.LG). The paper also uses image processing techniques (cs.GR) and statistical methods (cs.IR) for its proposed solutions.
